name: Tail Dragger Academy
about: Tail Dragger Academy, operated by Microlight Adventures, is a specialized flight school located at the Petit airfield in the East Rand, Gauteng, South Africa. We focus on providing comprehensive tailwheel training, emphasizing the development of advanced stick and rudder skills. Our programs are designed to go beyond FAA minimums, ensuring our students become highly skilled and safe aviators. With a commitment to creating a vibrant aviation community, we offer immersive and highly structured courses, utilizing traditional tailwheel aircraft to enhance muscle memory and instinctual reflexes. Our experienced instructors are dedicated to helping each student master every stage of tailwheel flying, from primary training to advanced backcountry operations. Join us to elevate your flying experience and become a proficient tailwheel pilot.
